features.item: Close to town on a paved road

house_listing.comments: This comfortable home in the desirable Syringa Heights area offers privacy, quiet and easy access to Sandpoint on a paved street. There is plenty of room in the basement to add extra bedrooms. Enjoy the beautiful yard from the deck. In addition to the 2-car garage, there is covered RV storage.

for_more_information_contact.firm_name: Windermere Real Estate / Idaho First Realty
for_more_information_contact.firm_location: 212 N. First St. Suite 100 Sandpoint, ID
